mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO deploy_profile_operation ( profile_id, operate_id ,type) VALUES
(#{profileId},#{operateId},#{type})
INSERT INTO deploy_profile (id, name, description, config, system_id, fcd, fcu, lcd, lcu) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{configStr}, #{fromSystemId}, NOW(3), #{fcu}, NOW(3), #{fcu})

sql.if: LEFT JOIN deploy_profile_operation apo ON apo.profile_id = a.id

where.if: AND (a.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') OR a.`description` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.sql: FROM `deploy_profile` a LEFT JOIN cmdb_cientity cc ON cc.id = a.system_id LEFT JOIN deploy_profile_cientity dpc ON dpc.profile_id=a.id LEFT JOIN cmdb_cientity cct ON cct.id = dpc.ci_entity_id
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.name, a.description, a.config AS configStr, a.system_id AS fromSystemId, cc.name as fromSystemName, cct.id AS ciEntityId, cct.name as ciEntityName, dpo.type, dpo.operate_id as operateId, a.fcd, a.fcu, a.lcd, a.lcu
left join deploy_profile_operation dpo on dpo.profile_id = a.id WHERE a.id = #{value}

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.description, a.config as configStr, a.system_id AS fromSystemId, cc.name as fromSystemName, cct.id AS ciEntityId, cct.name as ciEntityName, cci.icon as ciIcon, a.fcd, a.fcu, a.lcd, a.lcu
LEFT JOIN cmdb_ci cci ON cci.id = cct.ci_id WHERE a.id in
#{id}
ORDER BY a.lcd DESC
